entry.title: PSO Day
entry.summary: We saw the L5 drama / entertainment championship categories this last weekend
entry.content:
Pole for the Hole

A bunch of our instructors were performing which was so cool to see. It's like we only get little clues about how they might look when performing from their classes. I was too shy to talk to any of them though.

We were way far back which made it a little difficult to see. Eventually Catgirl and I moved up a single row which felt surprisingly better. It was funny overhearing Dirty Jeff talk about all the judging rules with Diane.

I'm really glad I went again and that I got to bring Catgirl and that she liked it too. It's so inspiring to see all the babes being so extra and trying their hardest to be expressive. I think it's difficult to feel like yourself, and also difficult to figure out what you're even supposed to feel like, and pole has been a really great environment for exploring that.

New Fit

I also got a new pole fit that Diane complimented how it shaped my boobs.

Then we did superheroes in class and now my thighs are sore and gnarly looking ðŸ˜¿.
